messages.subject: Re: Unschooling with large family
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, thanks you all that responded to my question.  It has made me realize that what I am doing is working just great. Right now I am in the middle of
messages.messageBody:
Hey, thanks you all that responded to my question. It has made me
realize that what I am doing is working just great. Right now I am
in the middle of potty-training my twins so that has been taking up
a major portion of my time. I was feeling a bit guilty that I
wasn't "right there when needed" like I thought I needed to be.
I also received great encouragement from the single parent who
responded. It gave me a boost of confidence that I CAN do it too!
I'm off to check for wet undies again! LOL
